meanings.definition: A group of male singers known for their harmonious vocal style, particularly associated with surfing and beach culture.
meanings.sent1: The beachboys sang beautifully by the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to the beachboys' music while relaxing on the sand.
meanings.sent3: The beachboys decided to have a singing competition on the shore for fun.
meanings.sent4: Their voices blended like waves crashing together, just like the beachboys.
meanings.sent5: The harmonious melodies of the beachboys echoed across the beach, enchanting everyone.

meanings.definition: Young men who work at beaches, often providing services such as renting out equipment or giving surfing lessons.
meanings.sent1: The beachboys helped tourists rent surfboards and umbrellas.
meanings.sent2: Many beachgoers rely on the beachboys for surf lessons and chair rentals.
meanings.sent3: The beachboys joked about starting a sandcastle-building business.
meanings.sent4: The beachboys were like the lifeguards of the sand, always ready to assist.
meanings.sent5: With their tan skin and friendly smiles, the beachboys made the beach experience even better.
